title: Jollof Rice
instructions: Blend tomatoes, pepper, and onions together
Heat oil in a large pot and fry the blended mixture
Add rice and stir to coat with the sauce
Add water and seasonings
Cover and simmer until rice is cooked and tender

title: Egusi Soup
instructions: Grind egusi seeds into powder
Cook meat with seasonings until tender
Heat palm oil in a pot
Add egusi powder and stir continuously
Add meat stock and cooked meat
Add vegetables and simmer for 10 minutes

title: Puff Puff
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, yeast, and salt in a bowl
Add warm water gradually and mix into a smooth batter
Cover and let it rise for 1 hour
Heat oil in a deep pan
Scoop small portions of batter into the hot oil
Fry until golden brown on all sides

title: Suya
instructions: Cut beef into thin strips
Mix groundnut powder with spices to make suya spice
Coat beef strips with the suya spice mix
Thread beef onto skewers
Grill over charcoal or in oven until cooked
Serve with sliced onions and tomatoes

title: Moi Moi
instructions: Soak and peel beans
Blend beans with pepper and onions
Add palm oil, seasoning, and mix well
Pour mixture into containers or leaves
Add boiled egg if desired
Steam for 45 minutes until firm

title: Pepper Soup
instructions: Rinse and season the meat
Boil meat with onions and spices until tender
Add pepper soup spice and adjust seasoning
Simmer for 10 minutes to infuse the broth
Finish with scent leaf before serving

title: Abacha
instructions: Soak cassava strips in water for about 2 hours
Drain and squeeze out excess water
In a large bowl, mix cassava strips with palm oil, pepper, and onions
Add crayfish and salt to taste
Toss well and mix thoroughly until evenly coated
Serve cold as a snack or light meal

title: Banga Soup
instructions: Extract palm kernel broth by boiling the nuts and processing them
In a large pot, heat the palm kernel broth
Add diced fish and beef with seasonings
Simmer for 15 minutes until meat is tender
Add pepper, onion, and okra
Simmer for another 10 minutes and serve hot

title: Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and allow to cool completely
Heat oil in a large skillet
Stir-fry diced onions and peppers until fragrant
Add beaten eggs and scramble
Add cooled rice and mix well
Stir in mixed vegetables and soy sauce
Toss continuously for 3-5 minutes and serve
